name: auto-title
description: Automatically generate meaningful titles for your files using AI (OpenAI or Perplexity)

scripts.build:dist: bun run build && mkdir -p dist && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css versions.json dist/
scripts.deploy: bun run build:dist && test -f .obsidian-vault-path && cp dist/* "$(cat .obsidian-vault-path)/.obsidian/plugins/auto-title/" || echo 'Set vault path: echo /path/to/vault > .obsidian-vault-path'
scripts.version: node version-bump.js && git add manifest.json versions.json
